de:
In a verdant sanctuary, surrounded by a ravishing park, vast terraces and a superb swimming pool, Au Grand Hôtel de Sarlat captures the full light of the Périgord and offers exceptional tranquillity in the centre of town.

The welcoming reception area opens onto the outdoor pool, which is open in the summertime and covered and heated in the wintertime and is adjacent to the jacuzzi.

Depending on the season and passing whims, relaxation takes on a variety of atmospheres: at the patio around the fireplace, at the bar, around the piano, or at the spa, which includes a swimming pool, jacuzzi, sauna, fitness area, organic well-being area, and more.

Here you'll find contemporary modern comfort and a friendly team who remains discreetly at your service to offer you an unforgettable stay at this haven of peace and greenery.
en:
In a verdant sanctuary, surrounded by a ravishing park, vast terraces and a superb swimming pool, Au Grand Hôtel de Sarlat captures the full light of the Périgord and offers exceptional tranquillity in the centre of town.

The welcoming reception area opens onto the outdoor pool, which is open in the summertime and covered and heated in the wintertime and is adjacent to the jacuzzi.

Depending on the season and passing whims, relaxation takes on a variety of atmospheres: at the patio around the fireplace, at the bar, around the piano, or at the spa, which includes a swimming pool, jacuzzi, sauna, fitness area, organic well-being area, and more.

Here you'll find contemporary modern comfort and a friendly team who remains discreetly at your service to offer you an unforgettable stay at this haven of peace and greenery.
it:
In un ambiente verde, costruito intorno a un delizioso parco, a vaste terrazze e a una superba piscina, l'Au Grand Hôtel de Sarlat gode di tutta la luce del Périgord e di una calma eccezionale nel centro della città.

L'accogliente salone si affaccia sulla piscina all'aperto in estate, coperta e riscaldata in inverno, e comunica con la vasca idromassaggio.

E a seconda della stagione o dell'umore, il relax ha la sua atmosfera: patio con camino, bar, pianoforte, riposo intorno alla SPA: piscina, jacuzzi, sauna, fitness, area benessere biologica?

Modernità e comfort contemporaneo si combinano armoniosamente e un team accogliente, discretamente attento alle vostre esigenze, renderà indimenticabile questa oasi di calma e di verde.
fr:
Au sein d’un écrin de verdure, construit autour d’un parc ravissant, de vastes terrasses et d’une superbe piscine, Au Grand Hôtel de Sarlat est habité de toute la lumière du Périgord et d’un calme exceptionnel en centre ville.

L’accueillant salon donne sur la piscine à ciel ouvert l’été, couverte et chauffée en hiver, communiquant avec le jacuzzi.

Et selon la saison ou l’humeur, la détente a ses ambiances : patio avec coin cheminée, bar, piano, repos autour du SPA : piscine, jacuzzi, sauna, fitness, espace bien être bio …

Modernité et confort contemporains s’y conjuguent harmonieusement et une équipe accueillante, discrètement à votre écoute, vous rendra inoubliable ce havre de calme et de verdure.

The welcoming reception area opens onto the outdoor pool, which is open in the summertime and covered and heated in the wintertime and is adjacent to the jacuzzi.

Depending on the season and passing whims, relaxation takes on a variety of atmospheres: at the patio around the fireplace, at the bar, around the piano, or at the spa, which includes a swimming pool, jacuzzi, sauna, fitness area, organic well-being area, and more.

Here you'll find contemporary modern comfort and a friendly team who remains discreetly at your service to offer you an unforgettable stay at this haven of peace and greenery.

The welcoming reception area opens onto the outdoor pool, which is open in the summertime and covered and heated in the wintertime and is adjacent to the jacuzzi.

Depending on the season and passing whims, relaxation takes on a variety of atmospheres: at the patio around the fireplace, at the bar, around the piano, or at the spa, which includes a swimming pool, jacuzzi, sauna, fitness area, organic well-being area, and more.

Here you'll find contemporary modern comfort and a friendly team who remains discreetly at your service to offer you an unforgettable stay at this haven of peace and greenery.

hasBeenCreatedBy.schema:legalName: Office de Tourisme Sarlat Périgord Noir

de: Collecter, mettre en commun et diffuser le plus largement possible une information complète et de qualité au service de nos habitants et de nos visiteurs : voici les objectifs du SIRTAQUI, Système d’Information Régional Touristique de Nouvelle-AQUItaine. Le dispositif est mis en œuvre conjointement par le Comité Régional de Tourisme de Nouvelle-Aquitaine, les services touristiques de la Corrèze, de la Creuse, de la Dordogne, de la Gironde, des Landes, du Lot-et-Garonne, des Pyrénées-Atlantiques, des Deux-Sèvres, de la Vienne et de la Haute-Vienne, en collaboration avec les Offices de Tourisme, et avec le soutien financier de l’Europe et du Conseil Régional.
en: Collecter, mettre en commun et diffuser le plus largement possible une information complète et de qualité au service de nos habitants et de nos visiteurs : voici les objectifs du SIRTAQUI, Système d’Information Régional Touristique de Nouvelle-AQUItaine. Le dispositif est mis en œuvre conjointement par le Comité Régional de Tourisme de Nouvelle-Aquitaine, les services touristiques de la Corrèze, de la Creuse, de la Dordogne, de la Gironde, des Landes, du Lot-et-Garonne, des Pyrénées-Atlantiques, des Deux-Sèvres, de la Vienne et de la Haute-Vienne, en collaboration avec les Offices de Tourisme, et avec le soutien financier de l’Europe et du Conseil Régional.
